frame.name: Taking_captive
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> begins preventing a <fen>Captive</fen> from moving despite a tendency or desire on the part of the <fen>Captive</fen> to do so.
<ex><fex name="Agt">Authorities</fex> <fex name="Time">recently</fex> <t>captured</t> <fex name="Captive">several suspects who were hiding in a remote mountain area</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Captive">High value target</fex> has been <fex name="Manner">quietly and safely</fex> <t>secured</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Captive
FE.definition:
<def-root>The entity which is captured.
<ex>Police have <t>captured</t> <fex name="cap">three of the suspected bombers</fex> after a week-long search.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> brings the <fen>Captive</fen> into custody.
<ex><fex name="Agt">Authorities</fex> recently <t>captured</t> several suspects who were hiding in a remote mountain area.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition: <def-root>The instrument with which the capturing is carried out. </def-root>

FE.name: Reciprocation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The reason for the confinement.
<ex>He was <t>captured</t> <fex name="Reciprocation">for treason</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the event occurs.
<ex>Authorities <t>secured</t> the target <fex name="pla">in a private residence</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>The purpose for which the <fen>Agent</fen> takes the <fen>Captive</fen> into custody.
<ex>These targets were <t>secured</t> <fex name="Purpose">to ensure that they would pose no danger during the trial</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>An intentional action performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that accomplishes the action indicated by the target.
<ex>Troops <t>secured</t> the target <fex name="Mns">by entering his compound in small numbers and under the cover of darkness</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event (or state) which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (probably, presumably, mysteriously), force (hard, softly), secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may also indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Agent</fen> that affect the action (presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully). </def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>A state of affairs that the <fen>Agent</fen> is responding to in capturing the <fen>Captive</fen>.
<ex>She was <t>captured</t> quickly <fex name="Explanation">beacuse she was on the department's high priority targets list</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Cause
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Cause</fen> is the non-sentient entity which is responsible for restricting the movement or location of the <fen>Captive</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition:
<def-root>The description of one of the participants in the capturing event.
<ex>Make sure they're <t>taken</t> <fex name="dep">alive</fex>!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Containing_event
FE.definition:
<def-root>The larger event which contains or during which occurs the event of taking the <fen>Captive</fen> captive.
<ex>The suspects were <t>secured</t> <fex name="con">in a large raid conducted by both nations' police forces</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: capture.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: take under one's control and prevent from escaping.

lexUnit.name: capture.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the event of taking someone or something captive.
